website_summaries.verdict: Get 360-degree protection with this sturdy, comfortable, highly adjustable paintball helmet.
pros: Completely protects with a built-in visor, face mask, and adjustable panels on the top, back, and sides
The chin strap adds extra comfort and stability, and the visor offers 260 degrees of vision for maximum awareness
Helmet is fully vented to cut down on fogging
Quick-release system allows you to swap out foam pieces without tools
cons: Some users find this mask to be a bit tight around the nose, so it may not work well for people with glasses

customer_reviews.title: Not to impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap mask. Gets really hot. Mask fogged up very fast. Had to remove the full head peace to let air in. Not very impressed. But it does save your eyes. Wish I just spent a little more money and got a better mask.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons love these
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons are new to paintball (6 months) and these were Christmas gifts. They love them. Probably used more than any gift we've ever bought them. I played paintball for 10+ years and am familiar with previous versions of JT goggles. Quality was good then and even better now. I still have the paintball guns and masks we used 20 years ago. Just cant seem to give them up.
customer_reviews.author: Homer

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet, needs more ventilation for me
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other JT full helmets I've worn, this one fogs up more. I drilled a few extra small ventilation holes in the nose area and cut some gaps in the foam that surrounds the eye protection and it fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: ShinobiNoMono

customer_reviews.title: fits with glasses too
customer_reviews.text: My guy who wears glasses was able to wear them inside the helmet. Kept him from being a punch dummy. Good product, great fit, comfortable and good protection.
customer_reviews.author: DarDar13

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great protection. Lens isn’t quite big enough to fit your glasses in right, but can manage.
customer_reviews.author: Justin O.

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, just a tiny bit too wide to see through red-dot
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and light, covers the neck too. I found that it's just a little bit too wide around my chin to easily see my red dot, since it pushes against the gun before you eye can fully align with the scope. I bought a scope raiser and that completely solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Marais

customer_reviews.title: its convertible
customer_reviews.text: awesome paintball mask fits perfect. easily comes apart to clean and you can use without top and back head shield
customer_reviews.author: NOE

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money. The only issue I have is when you leave the top on, your lenses will fog if there’s any humidity. Definitely had to buy the double lenses for it and now it’s not as bad.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Used this a couple times now, they are very comfortable and offer more protection than others. They didn’t fog much at all when playing where other players using the rental masks were all having trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Full protection, got a little foggy
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect, it fully protected our heads and faces, but once it started to rain it got foggy. Also if you wear glasses, they are very hard to put on while wearing your glasses. Other than that, they did exactly what I needed them to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: It does not hold up to the job
customer_reviews.text: At first my son loved it! But after 3 paintball games the helmet fell apart! Completely broken. The fit is great but it is def. Not durable or long lasting. Thats money down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely lightweight yet durable. I love the complete 360 protection along with great, clear vision and no peripheral blocking.
customer_reviews.author: Wyse SoLyrycal

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and well designed!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it in competition yet, but I like the fit and finish. Looking forward to testing it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The product was very good quality and came as ordered. it did not fog up, but the lens would get very wet and would be much worse in times then fog.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Compared to othe paintball mask. This is more then worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight nose fit
customer_reviews.text: Little tight around the nose other than that seems great.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: So this is a decent helmet but the plastic seems a bit flexible, not that it’s an issue. The only problem I had is it fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Yaseen yehia

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: It fooggsss like crazy and it broke the second day
customer_reviews.author: Luis orta

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, nice and snug, protects my full head including the back of my head all the way down to the back.of my neck- very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Legitimately fog-proof
customer_reviews.text: I sweat very easily and fog up every pair of goggles i wear,originally bought lancer tactical goggles and they fogged up almost immediately. JT goggles did not fog up once during a 5-hour session on a humid 80+ degree day. Only gripe is that the face shield is uncomfortable but i just cut it off with scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Molasses

customer_reviews.title: Sleek af 👌
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend and he absolutely loved it. He loves that he can take out the lense so clean it and be able to make it just the mask (but he prefers the full helm though lol) Its nice and it's comfortable too. The foam is the roght amount of softness too :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Very comfortable. Very protective with the top head part being covered, will order another one for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Did. Not. Fog.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. After paintballing for about 4 hrs this mask DID. NOT. FOG. Easy to clean and super comfortable. Easy off and on. It's lightweight but it can surely take a paintball ricochet. Haven't ever got hit directly in the mask so no comments on that. Bought this mask purely because I've had a minor concussion before and the more protection the better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Great full helmet for paintball! I was nervous about finding something that fit with my glasses on, but this did the trick! Now if only I could get it in camo it'd be just about perfect! Also, you might want to consider upgrading the lens to a double pane thermal as well.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Came Used
customer_reviews.text: My husband can’t even try it because it came used, with a lot scratches and hair from who knows! Disgusting!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: No black lense
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have a black lense other than that its good
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Yanez

product_meta.title: JT Premise Headshield Paintball Goggle Single Pane & Clear Lens, Black, One Size
product_meta.description: Get the total 360 degree of protection for any style field or scenario game. Whether you enjoy Alien invasions, zombie haunts, or just want to play paintball, JT has you covered! experience low impact or high adrenaline game play with total protection and confidence with the premise head shield protective vision system
feature_bullets: Removable full head coverage protection - no tools Required
Pro-change lens & foam quick release System - no tools Required
Accepts all JT spectra aftermarket lenses

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
